stitches approximately one in every selvedge edge stitch the exact number isn t too important but try and have the same number on each side of the legs pick up up inside leg 4 stitches from cast on at crotch pick and knit 1 stitch n every selvedge edge stitch from crotch to bottom edge of second inside leg work 3 stitch applied i-cord bind-off around inside legs repeat for inside legs on back piece applied i-cord bind off applied i-cord is time-consuming but creates a nice professional edge use a long circular needle or one circular and one double-pointed first pick up your stitches on a circular needle with new yarn cast on 3 and without turning slip the 3 cast on stitches onto the beginning of the circular left hand needle the working yarn should be coming from the 3rd stitch on the circular needle **knit 2 stiches pulling the yarn tight to close up the gap in the i-cord then knit the third stitch together with the first picked up stitch through the back loop ** you have now completed one round of i-cord and at the same time attached it to the working stitches and decreased one stitch slip the 3 stitches on the right hand needle back to the left hand needle and repeat all around sew the beginning and end of the i-cord together to finish applied i-cord tip unless you have multiple circular needles you won t be able to pick up all stitches before you start the applied i-cord instead you will need to work the pick up and applied i-cord for the arms and neck edging in batches of stiches pick up on circular needle to the top edge of one strap now start the applied i-cord at the beginning of the picked up stitches and work until the picked up stitches are consumed pick up the next batch of stiches and work the icord on these continue until all stiches have been picked up and worked sew in ends and block to given measurements sew or rivet popper fasteners to shoulder straps and to inside legs to use buttons instead of poppers work buttonholes into the applied i-cord by casting off 2-3 stitches and working 2-3 row of standard non-applied i-cord for each buttonhole and use buttons as fasteners for the straps and/or inside leg if desired
